betterquesting:10.desc:8:
While the §aWood Vinegar§r Distillation gives §aAcetone§r, the yield is low and might not suffice.

There is a direct §3LCR§r recipe from §aAcetic Acid§r to obtain §aAcetone§r.

If you want to be fancy, you can also the good old §aAcetic Acid§r -> §dDissolved Calcium Acetate§r -> §aAcetone§r loop, which does not require a §3LCR§r, but still recycles the Calcium compound perfectly.


§oI've been talking about Acetic Acid... but I haven't mentioned how to obtain it, wouldn't that be great?§r
§aAcetic Acid§r can be synthesized in the §3Chemical Reactor§r. My favorite recipe is from §dEthylene§r.
